name: validate_street_address
description: Validates a street name spoken by the caller against the list of known streets in Go-Flow Plumbing's service area (Sonoma and Marin counties). Call this tool after the customer provides their street address to verify the street name is correct. Returns the closest matching street names if no exact match is found.

streetName.description: The street name as heard from the caller (e.g., 'Petaluma Blvd N', 'Oak Ave', 'Sir Francis Drake Blvd'). Include the street type (St, Ave, Blvd, etc.) if the caller said it.

_setup_instructions: 1. In n8n, create a new workflow and import the contents of workflows/n8n-validate-address.json
2. Activate the workflow in n8n â€” it will give you a production webhook URL
3. Copy the webhook URL (it will look like: https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/validate-street-address)
4. In Vapi Dashboard, go to Tools > Create Tool > Custom Tool
6. Set the description as shown above
7. Add the parameter: streetName (string, required) with the description above
8. Set the Server URL to your n8n webhook URL from step 3
9. Add the tool to your assistant's model configuration
